snippet.title: I Was a Teenage Exocolonist Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Grow up to be a xenofauna rancher, a roboticist or a rebel with a cause in I Was a Teenage Exocolonist, a card-battling narrative RPG where you live (and die, and re-live) your torrid teenage years in humanity's first extrasolar colony.

I Was a Teenage Exocolonist is coming out on August 25th, 2022. Wishlist it today!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148760/I_Was_a_Teenage_Exocolonist/
https://exocolonist.com
